source.commentary: Provides access the host PC's graphics environment to gain access to its connected monitors. Michiel Drost - Nullpointer Works 1.0.0

method.commentary: Returns a Monitor object with the details of the selected display device.
method.name: getDisplay

returns.comment: a Monitor object with the details of the selected display device

param.name: id
param.comment: is the monitor identity on the host OS. Provide the identity - 1.

method.commentary: Returns an array of Monitor objects for each connected monitor.
method.name: getDisplay

returns.comment: an array of Monitor objects for each connected monitor

method.commentary: Returns the host's graphics environment associated with the monitor.
method.name: getGraphicsEnvironment

returns.comment: the host's graphics environment associated with the monitor

method.commentary: Returns the host's graphics device associated with the monitor.
method.name: getGraphicsDevice

returns.comment: the host's graphics device associated with the monitor

method.commentary: Returns the display mode for this monitor. This contains bit depth, width, height, etc.
method.name: getDisplayMode

returns.comment: the display mode for this monitor

method.commentary: Returns the width in pixels of the display.
method.name: getWidth

method.commentary: Returns the height in pixels of the display.
method.name: getHeight

method.commentary: Returns the device ID on the host OS.
method.name: getDeviceID

returns.comment: the device ID on the host OS
